item.title: Python Packaging Tools
item.description: A note on Python Packaging Tools You can start from here Python Packaging Tool recommendations Packaging Python Projects The Packaging Flow Key tools Bootstrap process of creating new Python Package poetry pip-tools hatch hatch intro pdm pdm into flit pyscaffold poetry nice and modern. pip-tools I had cooked it before, good but require a lot of actions. hatch and pdm did not suit me, I tried but no results.
